ui.end-concentration-dialog-content: You are concentrating on {originName}. Are you sure you want to cast another concentration spell to replace it?

ui.declare-roll-as-damage-selected: Declare as damage to selected tokens

item.condition-creature-enters-area: A creature first enters the area on its turn
item.condition-creature-starts-turn-inside-ar: A creature starts its turn inside the area
item.condition-creature-ends-turn-inside-area: A creature ends its turn inside the area
item.condition-creature-moves-within-area: A creature moves within the area
item.condition-ally-enters-area: An ally first enters the area on its turn
item.condition-ally-starts-turn-inside-area: An ally starts its turn inside the area
item.condition-ally-ends-turn-inside-area: An ally ends its turn inside the area
item.condition-ally-moves-within-area: An ally moves within the area
item.condition-enemy-enters-area: An enemy first enters the area on its turn
item.condition-enemy-starts-turn-inside-area: An enemy starts its turn inside the area
item.condition-enemy-ends-turn-inside-area: An enemy ends its turn inside the area
item.condition-enemy-moves-within-area: An enemy moves within the area
item.condition-area-reveals-creature: A creature is revealed from the area
item.condition-area-reveals-ally: An ally is revealed from the area
item.condition-area-reveals-enemy: An enemy is revealed from the area
item.condition-target-hits.mwak: Hits with a melee weapon attack
item.condition-target-hits.rwak: Hits with a ranged weapon attack
item.condition-target-hits.msak: Hits with a melee spell attack
item.condition-target-hits.rsak: Hits with a ranged spell attack
item.condition-target-is-attacked.mwak: Targeted by a melee weapon attack
item.condition-target-is-attacked.rwak: Targeted by a ranged weapon attack
item.condition-target-is-attacked.msak: Targeted by a melee spell attack
item.condition-target-is-attacked.rsak: Targeted by a ranged spell attack
item.condition-target-is-hit.mwak: Is hit by a melee weapon attack
item.condition-target-is-hit.rwak: Is hit by a ranged weapon attack
item.condition-target-is-hit.msak: Is hit by a melee spell attack
item.condition-target-is-hit.rsak: Is hit by a ranged spell attack
item.condition-saving-throw-completed: Actor has made a saving throw
item.condition-skill-check-completed: Actor has made a skill check
item.update-apply-overtime: Activate over time damage and effects
item.update-end-on-save: End the effect on a save
item.update-end-on-check: End the effect on an ability check

active-effect.apply-on-save-or-miss: Apply the effect if the save succeeds or the attack misses
active-effect.blocks-area-conditions-hint: While this effect is active on an actor, area based conditions on the item itself will not trigger for this actor.
active-effect.application-phase-hint: The conditions for the activation are determined in the effect application section below and on the main item sheet
active-effect.track-independent-duration: Track duration independently from concentration or master effect
active-effect.track-independent-duration-hint: With this enabled, this effect will stay running until the end of its duration even if the caster drops the effect.
active-effect.aura-targets: Apply this effect as an aura
active-effect.aura-targets-hint: The radius of the aura is taken from the target row of the main item, which should be a radius in feet

warn.select-single-target-for-attack: Select a target for the attack
warn.damage-roll-has-no-parts: There is no damage to roll!
